title: Forecasting
text: Decide whether to impose or relax lockdown restrictions, the management of PPE and supplies, or important resources.

title: Estimation
text: Estimate and procure material and human resources in advance. T-CUBE turns your company from reactive to proactive.

title: Easy API Integration
text: Scalable and adaptive for user-centric data. T-CUBE can be integrated with any system and for any amount of users to track COVID.
